item.title: Safe zone problem
item.dc:creator: @yazoomafroo yazoomafroo
item.description:
@yazoomafroo wrote:

Hey, I’m having a bit of a problem with a safe zone at the moment.

I have this at the moment for my wilderness areas:

public boolean isInWilderness(int coordX, int coordY, int Type) { if (Type == 1) { if ((coordY >= 3523) && (coordY <= 3967) && (coordX <= 3392) && (coordX >= 2942) || absX >= 3220 && absX <= 3299 && absY >= 3520 && absY <=3548 || absX >= 2377 && absX <= 2429 && absY >= 3070 && absY <=3143 || absX >= 2250 && absX <= 2296 && absY >= 4676 && absY <=4715) { return true; } } else if (Type == 2) { if ((coordY >= 3512) && (coordY <= 3967) && (coordX <= 3392) && (coordX >= 2942)) { return true; } } else if (Type == 3) { if ((coordY >= 4680) && (coordY <= 4711) && (coordX <= 2256) && (coordX >= 2287)) { return false; } } return false;

Now the one that is type==3 has return false which “should” make kbd a safe zone, right?

Anyways, I tried this and it’s not working so can someone help me please?

Thanks.

Read full topic
